bullets: Designed and maintained scalable data processing pipelines using Hadoop and Hive, enhancing automation and reducing manual effort by 50%.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins for multi-cloud deployments, ensuring consistent integration and reducing deployment time by 40%.
Developed RESTful APIs and microservices in Python, optimizing response times by 30% and enhancing data-driven application performance.
Automated testing pipelines using Docker and Jenkins, improving build stability and increasing code quality metrics by 25%.
Leveraged GPU acceleration for machine learning models, achieving a 40% reduction in training latency and optimizing resource utilization.
Built an intelligent grading engine using GPT-4 API, automating evaluation processes and reducing manual grading time by 80% with 95% accuracy.
Developed an NLP pipeline to automate resume tailoring, achieving a 15% increase in skill-coverage accuracy through advanced semantic retrieval.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams in Agile environments to integrate ML capabilities into production systems, enhancing overall system efficiency.

projects.title: AutoResuAgent - Automated Resume Tailoring System
projects.description: Built end-to-end NLP pipeline using Sentence-BERT and FAISS for semantic retrieval of relevant experiences.
bullets: Integrated LLM (GPT-4/Claude) for generating tailored resume bullets and cover letters.
Implemented validation layer with hallucination detection and skill coverage metrics.
Created LaTeX rendering pipeline for professional PDF output.
